objectives: Understand the key regulatory compliance requirements for consumer electronics including FCC, CE, UL, RoHS, and REACH certifications
Learn how to organize and centralize compliance documentation using structured repository systems like Docsie
Implement automated workflows for tracking regulatory changes and managing document version control effectively
Master collaboration strategies between engineering, legal, and compliance teams for seamless documentation management
Discover audit preparation techniques and best practices for maintaining compliance readiness in electronics manufacturing
